t:
“The biggest lie we told everyone is that vampires do not exist,” I told as I sank my fangs in her neck.

“And we lied that we only come out during the full moon,” she said as she stuck her claws through my chest.
c:
“It's good to see you two getting together. But you should get a room.” Said the man coming out of the alley, tightening the screws on his neck.



#vampire #werewolf #lie #fight #feed #death
